leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of fur quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new furry hide spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, [npc.her] toenails thicken into sharp claws, and tough leathery pads grow to cover [npc.her] soles, leaving [npc.herHim] with odd, hand-like, skirren feet. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new fur smoothly transitions into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh. Suddenly just as [npc.she] thought the transformation ended [npc.her] skin around [npc.her] hips starts to sag and starts to form a natural skirt down to [npc.her] ankles. [npc.she] experimentally move your legs and find out it doesn't impede [npc.her] movement in any way.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSquirrel(skirren legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription]. I'm a going to boing so high now.
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into skirren paws, complete with sharp claws and tough, leathery, padded soles. [npc.her] skirren skirt rests comfortably around [npc.her] legs. So warm.
